entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries or rain showers. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning in the morning. Flurries with periods of freezing rain in the morning and with a few rain showers in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few flurries or rain showers and periods of freezing rain ending in the evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Freezing rain and a few flurries beginning after midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:58 PM EDT Friday 14 April 2023
